amendment.description: Amendment ensures that excess funds realized as a result of the implementation of the bill are used to reduce the annual Federal budget deficit.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 113-47 to ensure that excess funds are used to reduce the annual Federal budget deficit.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Collins (GA) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Collins (GA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Collins (GA) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
